title: Evolution Compliance Evidence Mapper
reason: We need this skill because agents stagnate without structured reflection and continuous improvement loops. This specific skill keeps proof of control coverage continuously current.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Evolution Compliance Evidence Mapper`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to capability stagnation and repeated blind spots.
Design and version the input/output contract for outcomes, error taxonomies, and adaptation decisions, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using requirement-to-evidence mapping, and produce compliance evidence matrices with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover capability stagnation and repeated blind spots, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
